<ClientOnly>
<vue-fab :scrollAutoHide="false">
</vue-fab>
</ClientOnly>
# 关闭滚动自动隐藏

## VueFab
| Option |  Type  | Params | Description |
| ------ | --------  | ------ | ----------  |
| scrollAutoHide  | Boolean | true / false | 默认关闭 |
对于不想开启滚动自动隐藏的开发者，提供了关闭的选项

``` html
<vue-fab :scrollAutoHide="false">
</vue-fab>
```
